AI Description: ncftp is a powerful and easy-to-use command-line FTP client for various operating systems. It provides a wide range of features for transferring files over FTP protocols.
Core Features: Support For Ftp, Ftps, & Http Protocols, Bookmarking For Easy Navigation, Recursive File Transfer & Directory Mirroring, Scriptable Automation With Batch Processing, Remote File Editing & Permission Management
General Tags: Ftp Client, Command-Line Interface, File Transfer, Automation
